code: export var required=function required(value){if(value){return undefined;}else if(!value){return"Це обов'язкове поле";}};export var maxLenghtCrater=function maxLenghtCrater(maxLenght){return function(value){if(value.length>maxLenght||isNaN(Number(value))){return"\u041D\u0435 \u0432\u0456\u0440\u043D\u0438\u0439 \u043D\u043E\u043C\u0435\u0440 \u0442\u0435\u043B\u0435\u0444\u043E\u043D\u0430";}return undefined;};};export var nameCreate=function nameCreate(value){if(Number.isInteger(value)==false){return"\u041D\u0435\u0432\u0456\u0440\u043D\u0435 \u0456\u043C'\u044F";}return undefined;};
